languages.text: "Я... могу двигаться, да. Варп их разорви, мне, кажется, вывернули нервы наизнанку и пришили в таком виде заново. Какое-то время мне придется терпеть боль от каждого шага — пока я не смогу восстановиться. Теперь, когда мои силы не ограничены, это вполне возможно..."

"I can... move, yes. Warp take them, I feel like my nerves have been turned inside out and then sewn back like that. For the time being, I will have to suffer pain whenever I take a step until I recuperate. Now that I am free to use my powers again, it's entirely achievable..."
languages.original_text: "Я... могу двигаться, да. Варп их разорви, мне, кажется, вывернули нервы наизнанку и пришили в таком виде заново. Какое-то время мне придется терпеть боль от каждого шага — пока я не смогу восстановиться. Теперь, когда мои силы не ограничены, это вполне возможно..."

traits.locale_text: "I can... move, yes. Warp take them, I feel like my nerves have been turned inside out and then sewn back like that. For the time being, I will have to suffer pain whenever I take a step — until I recuperate. Now that I am free to use my powers again, it's certainly achievable..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can... move, yes. Warp take them, I feel like my nerves have been turned inside out and then sewn back like that. For the time being, I will have to suffer pain whenever I take a step — until I recuperate. Now that I am free to use my powers again, it's certainly achievable..."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can... move, yes. Warp take them, I feel like my nerves have been turned inside out and then sewn back like that. For the time being, I will have to suffer pain whenever I take a step until I recuperate. Now that I am free to use my powers again, it's entirely achievable..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can... move, yes. Warp take them, I feel like my nerves have been turned inside out and then sewn back like that. For the time being, I will have to suffer pain whenever I take a step until I recuperate. Now that I am free to use my powers again, it's entirely achievable..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ…動ける。奴らは〈歪み〉にやられた。神経が裏返ったような、縫い直されたような感じがする。当分の間、回復するまでは一歩踏み出すたびに痛みに苦しむことになるだろう。再び力を自由に使えるようになった今なら、必ず達成できる…」
languages.original_text: "I can... move, yes. Warp take them, I feel like my nerves have been turned inside out and then sewn back like that. For the time being, I will have to suffer pain whenever I take a step until I recuperate. Now that I am free to use my powers again, it's entirely achievable..."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ…動ける。奴らは〈歪み〉にやられた。神経が裏返ったような、縫い直されたような感じがする。当分の間、回復するまでは一歩踏み出すたびに痛みに苦しむことになるだろう。再び力を自由に使えるようになった今なら、必ず達成できる…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我……还能走，没错。愿亚空间吞噬他们，我现在感觉我的神经像是被翻了个底朝天，之后就那样缝了回去。现在，我每走一步都要忍受痛苦，直到我的身体恢复为止。不过，既然我又可以自由使用我的力量了，那这个目标肯定可以实现……”
languages.original_text: "I can... move, yes. Warp take them, I feel like my nerves have been turned inside out and then sewn back like that. For the time being, I will have to suffer pain whenever I take a step until I recuperate. Now that I am free to use my powers again, it's entirely achievable..."

traits.locale_text: “我……还能走，没错。愿亚空间吞噬他们，我现在感觉我的神经像是被翻了个底朝天，之后就那样缝了回去。现在，我每走一步都要忍受痛苦，直到我的身体恢复为止。不过，既然我又可以自由使用我的力量了，那这个目标肯定可以实现……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Puedo... moverme, sí. Me siento como si me hubieran puesto los nervios del revés y luego me los hubieran vuelto a coser. Por el momento, tendré que soportar el dolor que me produce cada paso hasta que me recupere. Ahora puedo usar mis poderes de nuevo, es perfectamente posible...».
languages.original_text: "I can... move, yes. Warp take them, I feel like my nerves have been turned inside out and then sewn back like that. For the time being, I will have to suffer pain whenever I take a step until I recuperate. Now that I am free to use my powers again, it's entirely achievable..."

traits.locale_text: «Puedo... moverme, sí. Me siento como si me hubieran puesto los nervios del revés y luego me los hubieran vuelto a coser. Por el momento, tendré que soportar el dolor que me produce cada paso hasta que me recupere. Ahora puedo usar mis poderes de nuevo, es realmente posible...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kann ... mich bewegen, ja. Möge der Warp sie verschlingen, ich fühle mich, als wären meine Nerven umgestülpt und dann falsch herum wieder eingenäht worden. Bis ich wieder vollständig genesen bin, muss ich bei jedem Schritt Schmerzen erdulden. Da ich meine Kräfte nun wieder einsetzen kann, ist eine vollständige Genesung möglich ..."
languages.original_text: "I can... move, yes. Warp take them, I feel like my nerves have been turned inside out and then sewn back like that. For the time being, I will have to suffer pain whenever I take a step until I recuperate. Now that I am free to use my powers again, it's entirely achievable..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann ... mich bewegen, ja. Möge der Warp sie verschlingen, ich fühle mich, als wäre meine Nerven umgestülpt und dann falsch herum wieder eingenäht worden. Bis ich wieder vollständig genesen bin, muss ich bei jedem Schritt Schmerzen erdulden. Da ich meine Kräfte nun wieder einsetzen kann, ist eine Genesung sicherlich möglich ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je peux... bouger, oui. Que le Warp les emporte ! J'ai l'impression que mes nerfs ont été retournés et recousus à l'envers. Quoi qu'il en soit, je n'ai d'autre choix que de supporter la douleur, et ce, jusqu'à ce que je récupère. Ce qui devrait être possible, maintenant que je peux de nouveau utiliser mes pouvoirs... »
languages.original_text: "I can... move, yes. Warp take them, I feel like my nerves have been turned inside out and then sewn back like that. For the time being, I will have to suffer pain whenever I take a step until I recuperate. Now that I am free to use my powers again, it's entirely achievable..."

traits.locale_text: « Je peux... bouger, oui. Que le Warp les emporte ! J'ai l'impression que mes nerfs ont été retournés et recousus à l'envers. Quoi qu'il en soit, je n'ai pas d'autre choix que de supporter la douleur, et ce, jusqu'à ce que je récupère. Ce qui ne devrait pas être impossible, maintenant que je peux de nouveau utiliser mes pouvoirs... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Yürüyebilirim, evet... Öteboyut, zenoların belasını versin. Tüm sinirlerim ters yüz edilip öylece geri dikilmiş gibi hissediyorum. Toparlanana dek attığım her adımda acı çekeceğim. Artık güçlerimi yeniden kullanabildiğime göre tamamen iyileşmem mümkün..."
languages.original_text: "I can... move, yes. Warp take them, I feel like my nerves have been turned inside out and then sewn back like that. For the time being, I will have to suffer pain whenever I take a step until I recuperate. Now that I am free to use my powers again, it's entirely achievable..."

traits.locale_text: "Yürüyebilirim, evet... Öteboyut zenoların belasını versin; tüm sinirlerim ters yüz edilip öylece geri dikilmiş gibi hissediyorum. Toparlanana kadar şimdilik her adım attığımda acı çekmem gerekecek. Artık yeniden güçlerimi kullanabildiğime göre tamamen iyileşmem mümkün..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
